scripts.test: cp test/001.bkp.ass test/001.ass && ./xass.bin.js -x separar test/001.ass --incluir-estilo 'Sign - Menu' > test.report.txt && node test.js
scripts.test:live: cp test/001.bkp.ass test/001.ass && ./xass.bin.js -x separar test/001.ass --incluir-estilo 'Sign - Menu' && node test.js
